definitions.title: n.pr.loc.
definitions.body: near Hebron, where the patriarchs and their wives were buried, only in P, alw. c. art.; ´[[שׂדה אשׁר בַּמּ]] Ge 23:17, ´[[מְעָדַת הַמּ]] the cave of Machpelah v:Ge 23:9, Ge 25:9, [[מְעָרַת]]´[[שְׂדֵה הַמּ]] Ge 23:19, Ge 50:13, ´[[מְעָרָה אֲשֶׁר בִּשְׂדֵה הַמּ]] Ge 49:30.—cf. Buhl:Geogr. 160, 161.—(Evidently orig. appell., but meaning dub.; LXX to/ diplou=n\ acc. to Thes = part, lot, portion, as Eth. makfalt:).
